Equipment Actions.Action 1: Spear, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 20/60, Average Damage: 11 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 11 Bludgeoning plus 7 Fire and grapples

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Salamander makes 2 attacks, one with its Spear and one with its Tail

Abilities.Ability 1: Heated Body, The Salamander's body is extremely hot, causing nearby creatures to take an Average 7 Fire damage while attempting to attack it
Abilities.Ability 2: Heated Weapons, The Salamander's extreme heat causes metal weapons it uses to glow red hot, dealing an additional Average 3 Fire damage with them

Damage Resistances.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
